item.description:
Enjoy a magical, enchanted evening with Ova and friends at this year's Valentines Day Dance. DJ Mocha will again be spinning our tunes.

Sign up in advance and you will receive a complementary drink and a chance to win a fabulous chocolate and money basket.

 

Your options:

RSVP and pay $15 online:   http://www.meetup.com/Ova4D-Boston/events/44860612/              ; Online prepaid RSVPs close on February 7.

RSVP and pay $20 at the door:      http://www.meetup.com/Ova4D-Boston/events/49122212/                 ; Online RSVPs with pay at the door close on Feb 10 at 6 PM.

 

If you wish to be part of the Magical Singles Gift Exchange, bring a beautifully wrapped $10-15 present to the dance. Singles will be exchanging gifts throughout the evening in a very modified Yankee Swap. This will give you an opportunity locate other singles, to meet other singles by design, and to enjoy your present as a conversation starter. At the very least you will go home with a lovely unwrapped gift... and maybe the e-mail address of some interesting women who crossed your path, who you would have otherwise not dared to meet. So what have you got to lose?

 

Cost: $15 online, $20 at the door.

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Ova4D's Valentine's Dance - Some Enchanted Evening
